column.name: expression
column.value: (typeCode != null && id != null) && ((typeCode.value == "AREA" && id.schemeId != "FAO_AREA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "MANAGEMENT_AREA" && id.schemeId != "TERRITORY" && id.schemeId != "EFFORT_ZONE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_GSA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_STAT_RECTANGLE") || (typeCode.value == "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "FARM" )) || id.schemeId == "GFCM_STAT_RECTANGLE"

update.where: rule_id=(select rule_id from rules."rule" where br_id='FA-L01-00-0202')

column.name: expression
column.value: (typeCode != null && id != null) && ((typeCode.value == "AREA" && id.schemeId != "FAO_AREA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "MANAGEMENT_AREA" && id.schemeId != "TERRITORY" && id.schemeId != "EFFORT_ZONE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_GSA" && id.schemeId != "STAT_RECTANGLE" && id.schemeId != "GFCM_STAT_RECTANGLE") || (typeCode.value == "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "LOCATION" && id.schemeId != "FARM" ))

update.where: rule_id=(select rule_id from rules."rule" where br_id='FA-L01-00-0202')
